location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP NO.1: TURKEY IN EUROPE ZONE OF THE STRAITS SMYRNA THE ISLANDS'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper with manuscript additions in coloured inkDimensions: 495 x 430mm, on sheet 630 x 475mm

mods.abstract: This map shows Turkey where it is included in Europe and features the Straits, Smyrna [Izmir], and islands. The map indicates boundaries and relief with contours.The map includes a printing statement which reads '(B 16478) WT 18378-212.5050.10/20.H&S,LTD.'
